Title: Directs the commissioner of the office of children and family services to establish a consumer directed childcare pilot program in certain counties
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the office of children and family services to establish a consumer directed childcare pilot program for eligible families, within amounts appropriated therefor, in up to five counties with populations between 160,000 and 300,000.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to directing the commissioner of the office of children and family services to establish a "Consumer Directed Childcare Pilot Program" in certain counties
